yes.title: yes
yes.description: Canoeing is legal and physically possible, i.e. it's a right of way.

no.title: no
no.description: Canoeing is not permitted or not physically possible

designated.title: designated
designated.description: Canoeing is especially suitable and expected.

permissive.title: permissive
permissive.description: Canoeing is physically possible; it is allowed but could be restricted at any time

private.title: private
private.description: Canoeing may be physically possible; it's not open to the general public

discouraged.title: discouraged
discouraged.description: Canoeing is technically allowed and possible, but may often be unsafe or impractical

permit.title: permit
permit.description: Canoeing is allowed only after obtaining a permit, which is typically granted
